submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, col: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(col)

        i, j = 0, 1
        need = (n % 2) ^ 1
        ans = 0
        # print(col)
        while i < n:
            jmod = j % n
            if col[jmod] ^ col[jmod-1] == 0:
                # print(i, j, jmod, "wrong par")
                i = j
                j += 1
                continue
            if (j-i+1) < k:
                # print(i, j, "too short")
                j += 1
                continue
            else:
                # print(i, j)
                ans += 1
                i += 1
                j += 1
        return ans
